opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.

casebody.head_matter:

Argued April 27, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
